replies.body: Can we draw a homeguard of Graves, but with a Cigar?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
we will allow it...
I'm not sure if I just can't find it or not but has the shortlist been posted yet?
Reference to the Homeguard Insignia please :){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I imagine that it is up to you to draw/create your own :3
Pretty sure its this http://i.imgur.com/ucsl7xo.png, but would prefer a clearer version or even confirmation that this is in fact the Insignia.
Yup, that's right!
Does it have to be default or do skins count too?
As long as it is recognizable as a champion its fine to use a skin =D But remember you aren't drawing champions themselves you are drawing homeguards
I have the same question {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
sooo.... is the shortlist out yet or no?
Hey, can you confirm if my submission made it? its the with the glowing koala, zed, ashe and ekko.
When submitting and it says 'name' and then 'summoner name' do you have to put your real name in?? (not sure if this has been asked already)
I'm horrible at drawing but ill give it a try anyway. GL and HF to everyone trying out.

Sorry to ask a silly question, but to clarify before I start drawing, do you want us to draw the characters you have designed already (the 5 on the client etc) or create our own homeguard characters from scratch. 
-Thanks
Create your own Homeguard =D
thank you for replying, much appreciated! ^_^
does it have to be a famous oce landmark, if not can it be like coles or ebgame??? XD

"Oceanic players infused with aspects of a champion."

im an oceanic player does that mean i count? or does it have to be the "pros"?

Idk if I'm missing something but what kind of monster are we talking here. Is it the one like the koala beast thing, or can it be any sort of monster we create. Or is there like a page where you can reference the existing monsters? Do we even need to include a monster or can it just be a power pose shot of the heros??? Tyvm in advance
is there a chance that you will hire someone if their art work and the idea is extremely creative and good.
Just checking, do Thresh's hook and lantern count as 2 aspects?
{{champion:157}}
Is there a way to resubmit my art if i accidentally upload the wrong image?
I think you can just submit it again?, i've done that twice for previous competitions and i just messaged the facebook page to let them know i resubmitted
Hey Maraudaur, I seem to have trouble uploading a picture. When I click the enter button it does not respond/do anything, is there a file size limit or some other error that could be the cause?

Does the monster have to be a native animal, or can it be any kind (like a feral species)?

Also can the home guards be of any champion, thy don't have to be ocean-themed ones like Fizz or Naut?
would the sky tower as the background count as advertisement? i thought the skywalk part could be an awesome stage
Does the artwork have to be drawn or can it be a collage of actual photos with drawn aspects?
Does the monster have to be viable? say i want to have just a bunch of tentacles or such coming from on side would that be acceptable?
Yeah thats fine =D
does it have to be a cartoon kind of drawing?
Any style you want!
do i have to draw this on my pc? or can i draw it on paper and scan it up???
You can do both
as a graphic designer, I place my logo on all my work, am I allowed to leave my logo on there?
Thats fine!
I want to draw fizz, but he only has one aspect (trident)... does drawing the shark next to him count as the second? or do i take the clothes from one of Fizz's skins?
Is there a size limit on the actual size of the artwork or the file size?
wat homeguards?
http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com.s3.amazonaws.com/public/images/oce/OceanWeek2017/insignia.jpg
I cant draw but in hopes someone that can sees this, snoop dog nunu and nunu's yeti is snoope dog too, pls n ty
Would something like the USS Arizona Memorial count as an OCE landmark?
We are looking for landmarks mainly in Oceania - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oceania
if your drawing follows the guidelines and your picture quality is good does that mean you are in the shortlist? And what is the OCE landmark?

Shortlist will be picked based on the quality of the submission, originality of the piece and whether the entry follows the contest rules! Unfortunately not everyone that submits will get onto the short list
can we submit multiple entries? or just one?
You're allowed multiple entries. But we definitely suggest quality over quantity here =D

Can i draw a homeguard of a person that is a gender that includes a component of the opposite sex? (as in if i were to draw a guy that has like Ahri's Fox tails or is in Lux's Star guardian skirt?) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
